thread.title: Row grows as British Dressage chiefs say video showing Charlotte Dujardin whipping horse was leaked 'to cause maximum damage' on eve of Olympics - before urging people to be 'kind' to the three-time champion: Dutch rivals deny dirty tricks - UK news - NewsLocker
thread.title_full: Row grows as British Dressage chiefs say video showing Charlotte Dujardin whipping horse was leaked 'to cause maximum damage' on eve of Olympics - before urging people to be 'kind' to the three-time champion: Dutch rivals deny dirty tricks - UK news - NewsLocker
